title: Dedicate many hours
description: A minimum of 30 hours a week. It's not enough, you'll have to dedicate more hours to it. At first it seems impossible, but you'll notice an improvement quickly.

title: Program own projects
description: 10 hours working on your own projects is better than 10 hours watching tutorials. Motivation and involvement in the project will help speed up your learning.

title: Try to rest
description: Getting a good rest and disconnecting are vital. This way you will reduce stress and anxiety. You will improve your concentration and consolidate your learning.
